rf_rx_buffer_t Struct Reference

Detailed Description

The receive buffer structure.

Note:
Note that there will be two receive buffers of this type, as double buffering is being employed by this library.
See also:
rfm12_rx_status(), rfm12_rx_len(), rfm12_rx_type(), rfm12_rx_buffer() , rfm12_rx_clear() and rf_rx_buffers

Field Documentation

The actual receive buffer data.

uint8_t checksum

Checksum over the type and length header fields.

Length byte - number of bytes in buffer.

volatile uint8_t status

Indicates if the buffer is free or completed.

States for rx and tx buffers
